cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENTThe circulation of this paper has been strictly limited. " " VIt is issued for the personal use of......^f?r?rr^^$fOST SECRET. Copy No.W.M.(h5) 17TH CONCLUSIONS. MINUTE confidential Annex(9th February, 1945 - 12 noon)CONFERENCE of heads of governments(previous reference:W.M.(45) 16thConclusions,Minute 1)The War Cabinet at their meeting on Thursday,8th February (W.M.(h5) 16th Conclusions) had invited the Deputy Prime Minister to arrange forrevised drafts to the Prime Minister and theForeign Secretary on the subject of reparationsto be obtained from Germany.They now had before them revised drafts,which were approved subject to certain amendmends and despatched as FLEECE Nos. 329, 330 and 331 .Offices of the War Cabinet, S.W.1.
